name: HourGlass Window Bars 6" Rise
description:
These Raw Steel Hourglass Bars are in stock and ready to go! 

All Deep Six Cycles Handle Bars are 100% made in house. That means made in the USA! They are constructed from Tig welded .120 wall D.O.M. tubing. One of the benefits of this is if there is some minor tweak or modification to the design you desire. We can often slightly modify our design for your set of bars!

Pull Down and Pull back can be tailored to your needs. Just email me for more options. DeepSixCycles@gmail.com

name: Stumblers Support Sticker
description: Get 3 of these 2" Stickers for $5

name: Pre-Order Stumblers Support Koozie
description: These Koozies have our Slayer Inspired Support Logo! You know that shit is rad! The Pre-Order Sale will end Dec 10th and be ready for shipping by Dec 31st

name: PRE-ORDER ONLY Stumblers Support Hooded Sweat Shirt
description: These Sweat shirts have a large support image on the back and small image on the left front breast. This is a per-order sale. The Pre-Order will end on November 10th. Shirts will be available by Dec 31st

name: PRE-ORDER ONLY Stumblers Support Tee Shirt
description: These shirts have a large support image on the back and small image on the left front breast. This is a per-order sale. The Pre-Order will end on November 10th. Shirts will be available by Dec 31st

name: 1" Brass Grips For Internal Throttles
description:
These Brass Hand Grips are made in true Deep Six Cycles tradition. With our signature dished ends and high attention to detail. You will be hard pressed to find another set of Grips on the market like these!

They are available with a number of options. Including a Brushed or Polished Finish, Knurling or Smooth, And options for use with an internal throttle.

We recommend using an aftermarket aluminum throttle tube with our solid grips for best results.

options.name: Polished With Out Knurled Finish. For Use with 1" internal throttles. (Two 1" grips.)
Polished With Knurled Finish. For Use with 1" internal throttles. (Two 1" grips.)
Brushed Finish With out Knurls.For Use with 1" internal throttles. (Two 1" grips.)
Brushed With Knurled Finish For Use with 1" internal throttles. (Two 1" bore grips.)

name: Brass Jockey Shift Knob
description: Our Jockey Shift Knobs like all Deep Six Cycles products are made and polished to the hilt here in house. Right here in the USA! They are made to order which means if you need a specific thread size we can modify the design to suit your needs. The order may take 3 weeks or so to ship how ever. Since orders are processed in the order they are received.

options.name: Show Quality Polished Finish with 3/8 24 Threads

name: Aluminum Jockey Shift Knob
description: Our Hand Shift Knobs like all Deep Six Cycles products are made and polished to the hilt here in house. Right here in the USA! They are made to order which means if you need a specific thread size we can modify the design to suit your needs. The order may take 3 weeks or so to ship how ever. Since orders are processed in the order they are received.

name: Dished End Tubing Caps (Sold by the Pair)
description:
We have had quite a bit of demand for the caps we use to finish the open ends on some of our handle bars. These Caps feature the Deep Six Cycles signature dished ends. And are a great way to achieve that complete finished on an other wise open ended tube. 

 They are made from mild steel for easy welding with one end turned down for easy locating & centering in your tubing. For use with 1" or 7/8" .120 wall tubing (not pipe).

Welding required.

name: Brass Hand Grips for 1" Bars
description: Deep Six Cycles are now manufacturing Brass Hand Grips! Made entirely in house here in Asheville, NC. You know what that means 100% Made In The Usa! Available Raw or Polished to the hilt for 1" or 7/8" bars. These Grips can be made specifically to fit internal or conventional throttle set ups.

name: Brass Hex XS 650 Foot Pegs
description:
Even a blind man would have a hard time not noticing all the cool XS650 builds hitting the streets. In my mind one of the biggest eye sores on a custom XS are those damn fuggly rubber foot pegs! Foot pegs are one of the most often overlooked accessories on any custom build. My buddy Hugh at Hughs HandBuilt turns out some rad builds and never over looks anything!

 Hugh came to the shop and dropped off some stock pegs and brackets and said "Make it brass, make it cool". I had been dieing to work some solid brass hex stock into my product line and here was the perfect opportunity!

Here is an all new design just for you XS guys! They are rad as hell! They are made from solid brass with stainless adapters with a shrink fit connection. While there is nothing new under the sun I have yet to see another set of pegs quite like this!

All the hardware you need is included!

name: Aluminum 1"  Hand Grips
description:
These Aluminum Hand Grips are made in true Deep Six Cycles tradition. With our signature dished ends and high attention to detail. You will be hard pressed to find another set of Grips on the market like these!

They are available with a number of options. Including a Brushed or Polished Finish, Knurling or Smooth, And options for use with an internal throttle.

We recommend using an aftermarket aluminum throttle tube with our solid grips for best results.

Free Shipping in the Continental USA!

name: Aluminum Harley Foot Pegs
description:
These foot pegs are made in true Deep Six Cycles tradition. With our signature dished ends and high attention to detail. You will be hard pressed to find another set of foot pegs on the market like these! 

 They fit most Harley style foot peg mounts. And are available with options ranging from Brush or show quality Polished finish, & Knurled or smooth finish in the center. Toe shift peg and Brake peg sold separately. 

Shipping is included in the continental USA.

options.name: Full Show Polish / With Out Knurling

name: Aluminum XS 650 Tracker Pegs
description:
Made from Solid 6061 Aluminum, this over sized peg is 1.25" in diameter and knurled with the roughest knurling pattern for extra "Gription".  Extra deep grooves, Deep Six Cycles signature dished ends, and a brushed finish make these a killer addition to any XS650.  Toss those ugly mofo rubber things in the trash, because these mount up just like stock pegs to the factory brackets.  

Free Shipping in the continental U.S. hardware included!

name: 10" Win Bars (powder Coated)
description:
All Deep Six Cycles Handle Bars are 100% made in house. That means made in the USA! They are constructed from Tig welded .120 wall D.O.M. tubing. All our products are built to order. It may take 3 or so weeks to get them finished and shipped. One of the benefits of this is if there is some minor tweak or modification to the design you desire. We can often slightly modify our design for your set of bars!

Pull Down and Pull back can be tailored to your needs. Just email me for more options. DeepSixCycles@gmail.com

name: O.G. Hooligan Bars (Powder Coated)
description: Deep Six Cycles O.G. Hooligan bars for all those who feel comfortable (or used to) behind a set of BMX bars. These bars have a super 80's feel! Constructed from .120 wall 1” or 7/8” D.O.M. tubing, they are scaled up a bit for a motorsickle. In the near future expect something for the guys with slim bikes that may want to run some skinny, lane-splittin’ bars based on an ever- so-slightly more current take on the BMX design. Stay tuned!

name: Biltwell Bonanza Helmet Wine Red Metalflake DOT Approved
description:
When Biltwell introduced our super-comfortable open-face novelty helmets seven years ago, we helped resurrect a style that was synonymous with chopper builders and bikeriders of the '60s and '70s. After reenergizing the game with a virtual Skittle sack of solid and Megaflake colors, Biltwell next attacked the status quo with a line of DOT-approved open-face helmets in a whole new range of tough-looking flat paint finishes. In a few short years, Biltwell open-face helmets became as common as denim and leather at motorcycle hoedowns from Baja to the Big Apple.

Today Biltwell is changing the game again with the brand-new Bonanza helmet. This leaner, lighter and even more comfortable DOT-approved 3/4 lid boasts the same hand-painted finishes as the other lids on an even lower-profile molded ABS shell. The Bonanza's interior boasts a custom-shaped EPS safety shell and a hand-stitched liner with moisture wicking brushed Lycra panels and open-cell foam padding for breathability and comfort. The rugged nylon neck strap features plated steel D-rings and a snap strap end retainer with Biltwell anvil branding.

Bubble Shield not included!

name: Biltwell Biltwell Novelty Cobalt Blue Helmet
description:
The Biltwell Novelty helmet raises the style bar to a whole new level with each hand painted injection-molded ABS outer shell and hand-stitched open-cell foam liner. The removable interior of our non-DOT approved helmet is made up of a brushed Lycra and ventilated nylon panels for comfort and breathability. Each Biltwell Novelty helmet features chrome or rubberized edging depending on the colorway, and three snaps across the outer shell�s brow to accept visors and bubble shields. A vinyl goggle strap retainer on the back of the helmet completes the retro look.

WARNING: Do not wear the Biltwell Novelty helmet to operate any motorized or non-motorized vehicle.

These are a ONE SIZE FITS MOST helmet, we rarely have sizing issues unless someone has a very small head (helmet size xs).

name: Biltwell, Inc. Gloss White Gen2 Helmet
description: This is the next generation of Biltwell helmets. It's the same lightweight and comfortable shell but with a few significant upgrades. The flake is much bigger and crisper, hence the "Megaflake" name. Vintage style chrome strip around the opening is pure class and only available on a Biltwell. The new liner now has detail stitching and contrasting ventilated panels in the top. The embossed goggle strap has a new shape and an improved snap. Helmets are non-DOT approved and meant for novelty purposes only.

The new liner now has detail stitching and contrasting ventilated panels in the top. The embossed goggle strap has a new shape and an improved snap. Helmets are non-DOT approved and meant for novelty purposes only. One size fits most.

name: Biltwell. Sunset Duo Tone Vintage Style Megaflake Helmet
description:
Duo Tone Novelty Helmets start life as regular Mega Flakes and then have a darker candy sprayed around the outside for a custom look. These lids are produced in limited quantities and when one color combo runs out, we'll do a different one just to keep things interesting.

name: Biltwell Novelty Flat Olive Helmet
description:
The Biltwell Novelty helmet raises the style bar to a whole new level with each hand painted injection-molded ABS outer shell and hand-stitched open-cell foam liner. The removable interior of our non-DOT approved helmet is made up of a brushed Lycra and ventilated nylon panels for comfort and breathability. Each Biltwell Novelty helmet features chrome or rubberized edging depending on the colorway, and three snaps across the outer shell�s brow to accept visors and bubble shields. A vinyl goggle strap retainer on the back of the helmet completes the retro look.

WARNING: Do not wear the Biltwell Novelty helmet to operate any motorized or non-motorized vehicle.

These are a ONE SIZE FITS MOST helmet, we rarely have sizing issues unless someone has a very small head (helmet size xs).

name: Sparkle Red - "Coke Bottle" Grips
description: These Sparkle Red  "Coke Bottle" shape grips are  great for these 60’s influenced choppers and bobbers, sold in pairs. Size -- 1.5" x1

name: Sparkle Blue - "Coke Bottle" Grips
description: These Sparkle Blue "Coke Bottle" shape grips are  great for these 60’s influenced choppers and bobbers, sold in pairs. Size -- 1.5" x1

name: Green Metal Flake Grips
description:
These retro beauties are very unique and feature high quality thick rubber sheathing with pronounced metal flake accent throughout. The center is ribbed for maximum gripping and the ends are flared to prevent your hand from slipping off the bar end. 

Left Grip is 1" inside diameter and the right grip measures 1 1/8" outside diameter to fit your throttle assembly. Throttle sleeves are also available in the drop down menu listed below. If you have been scouring the web for a classic retro metal flake colored grip..LOOK No Further.
